title: (BONUS EP) KGB Crimes
description:
This month, the gals practice their Russian to discuss a scary and secretive government operation. Topics include Putin's penchant for extrajudicial punishment, a beachside execution, and one very rich double agent. Mix up a vodka soda for yourself, go off the grid, and tune in for KGB Crimes.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit https://wineandcrimepodcast.com/sponsors/
